mapper.select: SELECT ID,CODE_1,NAME_1,CODE_2,NAME_2,UNIT FROM PORTAL.TAB_TARGET_SALE WHERE CODE_1=#{code1} AND ISVALID='1' ORDER BY SEQENCING
SELECT ID,CODE,ORGNAME FROM APDP_ORG WHERE PARENT_ID=(SELECT ID FROM APDP_ORG WHERE CODE=#{code})

select.if: SELECT T.HQ_CHAN_CODE AS USERID, T.HQ_CHAN_NAME AS NAME, '10' AS USER_CODE FROM PORTAL.TAB_PORTAL_MOB_PERSON T LEFT JOIN PCDE.TB_CDE_CHANL_HQ_CODE T1 ON (T.HQ_CHAN_CODE = T1.FD_CHNL_CODE) WHERE T1.STATUS != '12' AND T.LEV = '2' AND T.USERID = #{task_region_code} AND T.IS_VALID = '1' AND T.DEAL_DATE=#{month}

SELECT T1.STD_6_ID AS USERID, T1.STD_6_NAME AS NAME, '11' AS USER_CODE FROM PORTAL.TAB_PORTAL_NET_PERSON T JOIN PCDE.TAB_CDE_6_STD T1 ON (T.STD_ID_6 = T1.STD_6_ID) WHERE T.USERID = #{task_region_code} AND T.IS_VALID = '1' AND T1.STATE = 'U' AND T.DEAL_DATE=#{month}

SELECT DISTINCT T1.NAME || '(' || T1.HR_ID || ')' AS NAME, T1.USERID, '3' AS USER_CODE FROM PORTAL.TAB_PORTAL_GRP_PERSON T, PORTAL.TAB_PORTAL_GRP_PERSON T1 WHERE T.HR_ID = T1.F_HR_ID AND T.USERID = #{task_region_code} AND T.USER_TYPE = '1' AND T.IS_VALID = '1' AND T1.IS_VALID = '1' AND T.DEAL_DATE=#{month} AND T1.DEAL_DATE=#{month}
SELECT T.GROUP_ID_1 AS ID, T.GROUP_ID_1_NAME AS NAME FROM PCDE.TB_CDE_REGION_CODE T WHERE T.GROUP_ID_1 NOT IN ('16099','86000') ORDER BY GROUP_ID_1
SELECT T.GROUP_ID_1 AS ID, T.GROUP_ID_1_NAME AS NAME FROM PCDE.TB_CDE_REGION_CODE T WHERE T.GROUP_ID_1 = #{code} AND T.GROUP_ID_1 NOT IN ('16099','86000') ORDER BY GROUP_ID_1

SELECT T.GROUP_ID_1 AS ID, T.GROUP_ID_1_NAME AS NAME FROM PCDE.TB_CDE_REGION_CODE T WHERE T.GROUP_ID_1 = (SELECT DISTINCT T1.GROUP_ID_1 FROM PCDE.TAB_CDE_GROUP_CODE T1 WHERE T1.UNIT_ID = #{code}) AND T.GROUP_ID_1 NOT IN ('16099','86000') ORDER BY GROUP_ID_1

SELECT T.GROUP_ID_1 AS ID, T.GROUP_ID_1_NAME AS NAME FROM PCDE.TB_CDE_REGION_CODE T WHERE T.GROUP_ID_1 = (SELECT DISTINCT T1.GROUP_ID_1 FROM PCDE.TAB_CDE_CHANL_HQ_CODE T1 WHERE T1.GROUP_ID_4 = #{code}) AND T.GROUP_ID_1 NOT IN ('16099','86000') ORDER BY GROUP_ID_1
